welcome_message_body: Welcome to Newport News, where history and charm come together! Explore our beautiful waterfront, rich maritime heritage, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you enjoy your stay and all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Vinny's Pizza And Pasta
restaurants.description: Vinny's Pizza And Pasta is a pizzeria located in Newport News.
restaurants.address: 332 Oyster Point Rd, Newport News, VA 23602

restaurants.name: Papou George's Hot Dogs
restaurants.description: Papou George's Hot Dogs is a hot dog joint located in Newport News.
restaurants.address: 303 Oyster Point Rd (at Warwick Blvd.), Newport News, VA 23602

restaurants.name: Carrabba's Italian Grill
restaurants.description: Carrabba's Italian Grill is a italian restaurant located in Newport News.

restaurants.name: Bonefish Grill
restaurants.description: Bonefish Grill is a seafood restaurant located in Newport News.
restaurants.address: 340 Oyster Point Rd, Newport News, VA 23602

restaurants.name: Andy's Pizza
restaurants.description: Andy's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Newport News.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newport News/Williamsburg Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Newport News/Williamsburg Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing services such as fueling and hangar storage.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'PHF Free Wi-Fi' in their device's network settings.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norfolk International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse primarily serves Delta and American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse primarily serves Southwest and United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.
